duck: Vigilance (video game), a 1998 PC game by SegaSoft
vigilance definition: the quality or state of being vigilant.
ZPG-3W, largest US Navy non-rigid airship ever built
Alertness - Alertness is the state of paying close and continuous attention, being watchful and prompt to meet danger or emergency, or being quick to perceive and act.
Vigilance (psychology), the ability to maintain attention and alertness over prolonged periods of time
Hypervigilance - Hypervigilance is an enhanced state of sensory sensitivity accompanied by an exaggerated intensity of behaviors whose purpose is to detect threats.

wiki.text:
'Vigilance' may refer to:

* Alertness
* Vigilance (psychology), the ability to maintain attention and alertness over
  prolonged periods of time
* ''Vigilance'' (album), by Threat Signal
* Vigilance, a
* Vigilance control on railways
* ''Vigilance'' (video game), a 1998 PC game by SegaSoft ;Airship
* ZPG-3W, largest US Navy non-rigid airship ever built
